ygData.subject: RE: New Lambent Armor stats
ygData.msgSnippet: if you are in the bedroom, there are two halls next to each other leading out.  the one on the right is the spider hall and if you keep following it around
ygData.messageBody:
if you are in the bedroom, there are two halls next to each other leading
out. the one on the right is the spider hall and if you keep following it
around will run into the gargs. i think hehe, have to get home and see.
there are also gargs near the bridge leading to the tower. if you head to
the right towards the live side instead of the tower, there are gargs there
though i don't know if any will spawn as basalts. i am guessing level is
around 35.

Shada


> From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
>
> Does anyone out there know where the basalt gargoyles can be
> found in Lower
> Guk and their approximate level? If so, would you be willing
> to share? :-)
> Thanks!
> Laena of E'ci
